Dart Monkey.name: Dart Monkey
Dart Monkey.description: Throws a single dart at nearby bloons. Short range and low pierce but cheap.

upgrades.name: Sharp Shots
upgrades.description: Can pop 1 extra Bloon per shot.

upgrades.name: Razor Sharp Shots
upgrades.description: Can pop 2 more Bloons per shot.

upgrades.name: Spike-o-pult
upgrades.description: Converts the Dart Monkey into a Spike-o-pult that hurls a large spiked ball instead of darts. Good range, but slower attack speed. Each ball can pop lots of Bloons.

upgrades.name: Juggernaut
upgrades.description: Hurls a giant spiked ball that pops lead and excels at crushing Ceramic Bloons.

upgrades.name: Ultra-Juggernaut
upgrades.description: Gigantic spiked ball splits twice into 6 Juggernaut balls for even more destructive power.

upgrades.name: Quick Shots
upgrades.description: Shoots 15% faster.

upgrades.name: Very Quick Shots
upgrades.description: Shoots 33% faster!

upgrades.name: Triple Shot
upgrades.description: Throws 3 darts at a time instead of 1.

upgrades.name: Super Monkey Fan Club
upgrades.description: Super Monkey Fan Club ability: Converts up to 10 nearby Dart Monkeys including himself into Super Monkeys for 15 seconds.

upgrades.name: Plasma Monkey Fan Club
upgrades.description: Elite membership of this club grants the Dart Monkeys even more power!

upgrades.name: Long Range Darts
upgrades.description: Makes the Dart Monkey shoot further than normal.

upgrades.name: Enhanced Eyesight
upgrades.description: Shoots even further and can detect Camo Bloons.

upgrades.name: Crossbow
upgrades.description: Uses a long range Crossbow that can pop 3 layers of Bloon for every hit.

upgrades.name: Sharp Shooter
upgrades.description: Sharp Shooter does powerful Crit Shots every few seconds that do a lot more damage.

upgrades.name: Crossbow Master
upgrades.description: Crossbow Master shoots really fast and devastates most Bloon types with ease.

Boomerang Monkey.name: Boomerang Monkey
Boomerang Monkey.description: Hurls a boomerang that follows a curved path. Good range and pierce.

upgrades.name: Improved Rangs
upgrades.description: Can pop up to 8 Bloons per throw.

upgrades.name: Glaives
upgrades.description: Throws sharper and faster glaives instead of boomerangs.

upgrades.name: Glaive Ricochet
upgrades.description: Glaives will bounce from Bloon to Bloon automatically and aggressively.

upgrades.name: M.O.A.R Glaives
upgrades.description: Multiple Object Advanced Ricochet greatly enhances the already extraordinary powers of the Glaive Ricochet Monkey.

upgrades.name: Glaive Lord
upgrades.description: Glaive Lord surrounds itself in 3 special glaives that shred anything that comes near.

upgrades.name: Faster Throwing
upgrades.description: Throws 25% faster.

upgrades.name: Faster Rangs
upgrades.description: Boomerangs travel around faster & attacks an aditional 25% faster

upgrades.name: Bionic Boomerang
upgrades.description: Replaces arm with a strong bionic arm that can throw boomerangs extremely fast.

upgrades.name: Turbo Charge
upgrades.description: Turbo Charge Ability: Makes this Monkey attack incredibly fast for 10 seconds.

upgrades.name: Perma Charge
upgrades.description: Perma Charge has a permanent super fast attack speed. Ability increases the lethality even more.

upgrades.name: Long Range Rangs
upgrades.description: Can throw boomerangs further than normal.

upgrades.name: Red Hot Rangs
upgrades.description: Allows boomerangs to pop Frozen and Lead Bloons. Also pops 2 layers.

upgrades.name: Kylie Boomerang
upgrades.description: Throws heavy Kylie boomerangs that follow a straight path instead of curved.

upgrades.name: MOAB Press
upgrades.description: Heavy Kylie boomerang hits MOAB-Class Bloons multiple times per throw and sometimes knocks them back a short way along the path.

upgrades.name: MOAB Domination
upgrades.description: Special knockback kylies trigger more often and do lots of extra damage.

Bomb Shooter.name: Bomb Shooter
Bomb Shooter.description: Launches a powerful bomb at the Bloons. Slow rate of fire but affects a radius around the explosion.

upgrades.name: Bigger Bombs
upgrades.description: Shoots larger bombs, they have a larger blast area and more popping power.

upgrades.name: Heavy Bombs
upgrades.description: Heavy duty bombs can smash through 2 layers of Bloon at once.

upgrades.name: Really Big Bombs
upgrades.description: Huge bombs blow up Bloons in a large area.

upgrades.name: Bloon Impact
upgrades.description: Explosions become so violent Bloons are stunned for a short time when they are hit.

upgrades.name: Bloon Crush
upgrades.description: Bloon shattering explosions do massive damage and can stun MOAB-Class Bloons.

upgrades.name: Faster Reload
upgrades.description: Reloads 20% faster.

upgrades.name: Missile Launcher
upgrades.description: Shoots missiles instead of bombs, missiles fly faster with longer range.

upgrades.name: MOAB Mauler
upgrades.description: MOAB Maulers do much more damage to MOAB-Class Bloons.

upgrades.name: MOAB Assassin
upgrades.description: Assassinate MOAB ability: Special missile flies out and does massive damage to MOAB-Class Bloons.

upgrades.name: MOAB Eliminator
upgrades.description: Assassinate ability does 6x damage with a shorter cooldown.

upgrades.name: Extra Range
upgrades.description: Increases attack range.

upgrades.name: Frag Bombs
upgrades.description: Explosions throw out sharp fragments that can pop more Bloons including Black Bloons.

upgrades.name: Cluster Bombs
upgrades.description: Throws out secondary bombs instead of sharp fragments every shot.

upgrades.name: Recursive Cluster
upgrades.description: Every second shot the cluster bombs send out more cluster bombs for even more destruction.

upgrades.name: Bomb Blitz
upgrades.description: When a Bloon escapes, a Bomb Storm will destroy every Bloon on the screen below a ZOMG.
